title: AI Content Specialist — Digital Twin & Faceless Channel Creation
job_overview:
I’m looking for an experienced AI Content Specialist to help bring my personal brand to life through cutting-edge AI technology. This role is NOT for beginners—I need someone with proven expertise who can:

Develop a hyper-realistic AI “digital twin” of me (video and voice)
Create high-quality faceless content for Instagram and YouTube that matches my style and brand
Maintain brand consistency across all AI-generated assets and content
Advise on best practices, tools, and ethical considerations in AI content creation
Key Responsibilities
? Build and train AI models to replicate my voice, appearance, and speaking style
? Produce AI-generated videos that look and sound like me
? Create engaging faceless videos or images for social media channels
? Collaborate on content strategy for brand growth
? Keep up with the latest AI tools and trends

Requirements
???? Proven experience designing digital twins (deepfake, voice cloning, avatars, etc.)
???? Expert knowledge of tools like HeyGen, Synthesia, D-ID, ElevenLabs, or similar
???? Strong video editing skills for seamless AI content integration
???? Understanding of AI ethics and rights related to digital likenesses
???? Portfolio of similar projects (must provide examples)

Nice to Have

Digital marketing or personal branding experience
Background in growing faceless social channels
Prompt engineering or scripting skills for AI tools
Work Terms

Remote
Part-time or project-based to start, with potential for ongoing work
Competitive pay (please include your rate expectations)
Why This Job is Exciting
This is a chance to work on innovative AI projects at the cutting edge of digital branding. You’ll be helping build a scalable digital presence that looks and feels authentically me.

Example of Someone Doing This Successfully:
A great example is Katie Cross Upgrade to see actual info on Instagram. She uses AI tools to extend her brand and produce engaging content, showing how a digital twin and AI-driven content can help scale personal branding without losing authenticity.

TO APPLY, PLEASE ANSWER ALL OF THESE QUESTIONS:

How long have you been designing AI replicated twins?
Please send us 3 references to your best work that YOU have personally designed.
Please send us a link to your OnlineJobs.ph profile.
Please tell us how much you’re looking to make (your desired hourly or project rate).
Do you already have another job?
Have you worked for American employers before?
How to Apply:
Reply through OnlineJobs.ph with your answers to the questions above. Applications without all questions answered will not be considered.
